name: Overshoot
description:
Overshoot - A space game

You are trapped in a tin can, hundreds of miles above the surface, but gravity is still pulling you down all the same. Even worse: your ship broke and you can only control either rotation or thrust at one time. Your guidance computer provides you with the bare minimum of information to fly and it shows you your next target.

Try to collect as many coins as possible.

Controls:

X - Switch modes

Arrow keys - Fire your engine or adjust your orientation

Made for the GMTK game jam 2019.
